inclusion.criterion: Blood for measurement of serum 25(OH)D levels will be obtained from all HIV-infected children and adolescents by the participating clinical sites.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pregnancy test for females of child bearing capacity
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Assessment of dietary intake of calcium and vitamin D
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Determination of total body bone mineral content (TBBMC), total body bone mineral density (TBBBMD), spinal BMC and BMD, and bone age radiograph
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Fasting morning blood draw for indices of mineral metabolism: serum calcium, phosphate, albumin, total alkaline phosphatase activity, 25(OH)D, 1,25(OH)2D, iPTH, urinary calcium and creatinine
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Markers of bone turnover: Serum N-telopeptide (N-tx, a marker of resorption), bone specific alkaline phosphatase (BALP) and osteocalcin (markers of formation)
inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone and is starting Bisphosphonate therapy. The sister had the same problems at age 52.
